hadiths.text: Ibn Hunain narrated that 'Ali said to him:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] forbade me (from wearing) garments dyed with safflower, and from gold rings, and from wearing Al-Qassi, and that I recite Qur'an while I am bowing

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى يَحْيَى بْنِ أَبِي كَثِيرٍ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Differences Reported From Yahya Bin Abi Kathir About That
